content: This is the first of its kind,  I think we are gradually moving closer to a world where crypto will be the monetary order. In the just concluded Blockworks digital assets submit held on March 20, 2025 in New York. Trump  addressed the crypto submit through a recorded video pledging his support for crypto assets.In his speech he stated the United States through his administration is going to dorninate the crypto market as well as the next generation of financial technology. He admitted it wasn't going to be an easy task but his administration is ready for what it will take.March 7, 2025 we had the first White House digital submit for this administration bringing together top crypto experts to discuss the future of digital assets in the US,  On the January  23,  2025 Trump signed an executive order establishing a working group to study the creation of a potential Bitcoin reserve and a new regulatory framework. This is showe how much this administration is dedicating towards the advancement team of the Bitcoin and the digital assets generally.This administration is dedicated to ending regulation wars in Bitcoin and crypto generally. Trump shared his  intentions to improve the banking and payment system to promote greater privacy, safety, security, and wealth for American consumers and businesses.Video:https://youtu.be/xhW9up0Gi2E?si=_Up5W2pWyd6JDARQ
